mapper.insert: insert into t_products (products_id, brand_id, car_type, price_range, position, title, car_model, out_color, in_color, country, power, engine, factory_date, china_price, basic_configure, must_configure, optional_configure, car_price, must_configure_price, status, recommend, stock, gearbox, deposit, create_date, oper_id, update_date, version, doors, seats, remarks, car_standards,self_support, personal, sales, distributor, content ) values (#{productsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priceRange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{chinaPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{basicConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mustConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionalConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mustConfigurePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gearbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deposit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carStandards,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfSupport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sales,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{distributor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update t_products
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price_range = #{priceRange,jdbcType=INTEGER},
position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_model = #{carModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_color = #{outColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_color = #{inColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
power = #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
engine = #{engine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
factory_date = #{factoryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
china_price = #{chinaPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
basic_configure = #{basicConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
must_configure = #{mustConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optional_configure = #{optionalConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_price = #{carPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
must_configure_price = #{mustConfigurePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gearbox = #{gearbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
oper_id = #{operId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
doors = #{doors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seats = #{seats,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_standards = #{carStandards,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
self_support = #{selfSupport,jdbcType=INTEGER},
personal = #{personal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sales = #{sales,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
distributor = #{distributor,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where products_id = #{productsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_products set brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price_range = #{priceRange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_model = #{carModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_color = #{outColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_color = #{inColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, power = #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine = #{engine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factory_date = #{factoryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, china_price = #{chinaPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, basic_configure = #{basicConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, must_configure = #{mustConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optional_configure = #{optionalConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_price = #{carPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, must_configure_price = #{mustConfigurePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gearbox = #{gearbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oper_id = #{operId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doors = #{doors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seats = #{seats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_standards = #{carStandards,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, self_support = #{selfSupport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, personal = #{personal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, distributor = #{distributor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where products_id = #{productsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_products set brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price_range = #{priceRange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_model = #{carModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_color = #{outColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_color = #{inColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, power = #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine = #{engine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factory_date = #{factoryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, china_price = #{chinaPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, basic_configure = #{basicConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, must_configure = #{mustConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optional_configure = #{optionalConfigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_price = #{carPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, must_configure_price = #{mustConfigurePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gearbox = #{gearbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oper_id = #{operId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doors = #{doors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seats = #{seats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_standards = #{carStandards,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, self_support = #{selfSupport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, personal = #{personal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, distributor = #{distributor,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where products_id = #{productsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT sc.sc_value as sc_value, tp.products_id as products_id, tp.brand_id as brand_id, tp.car_type as car_type, tp.price_range as price_range, tp.position as position, tp.title as title, tp.factory_date as factory_date, tp.china_price as china_price, tp.basic_configure as basic_configure, tp.must_configure as must_configure, tp.optional_configure as optional_configure, tp.car_price as car_price, tp.must_configure_price as must_configure_price, tp.content as content, tp.country as country, tp.personal as personal, tp.sales as sales, tp.distributor as distributor, tp.deposit as deposit, tp.car_model as car_model, tp.out_color as out_color, tp.in_color as in_color, tp.engine as engine, tp.self_support as selfSupport, tp.gearbox as gearbox, tp.stock as stock FROM t_products tp LEFT JOIN sys_config sc on tp.brand_id = sc.id WHERE products_id = #{id}

SELECT tp.products_id as products_id, tp.title as title, tp.personal as personal, tp.stock as stock, tp.sales as sales, tp.distributor as distributor, tp.car_model as car_model, tp.out_color as out_color, tp.`engine` as `engine`, tp.car_price as car_price, tp.gearbox as gearbox, tpi.file_path as file_path FROM t_products tp LEFT JOIN t_products_image tpi ON tp.products_id = tpi.product_id LEFT JOIN sys_config sys ON tp.brand_id = sys.id WHERE tp.recommend = 1 AND tpi.type = 1 AND sys.state = 0 ORDER BY rand()

SELECT tp.products_id as products_id, tp.title as title, tp.country as country, tp.position as position, tp.personal as personal, tp.sales as sales, tp.distributor as distributor, tp.china_price as china_price, tp.car_price as car_price, tpi.file_path as file_path FROM t_products tp LEFT JOIN t_products_image tpi ON tp.products_id = tpi.product_id LEFT JOIN sys_config sys ON tp.brand_id = sys.id WHERE tp.`status` = 2 and tp.recommend = 0 AND tpi.type = 1 AND sys.state = 0 ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT tp.products_id as products_id, tp.title as title, tp.position as position, tp.china_price as china_price, tp.stock as stock, tp.personal as personal, tp.sales as sales, tp.distributor as distributor, tp.car_model as car_model, tp.out_color as out_color, tp.country as country, tp.car_price as car_price, tp.in_color as in_color, tp.engine as engine, tp.gearbox as gearbox, tp.content as content, tp.brand_id as brand_id FROM t_products tp LEFT JOIN sys_config sys ON tp.brand_id = sys.id WHERE products_id = #{productsId} AND sys.state = 0

SELECT tp.products_id as products_id , tp.title as title, tp.personal as personal, tp.sales as sales, tp.distributor as distributor, tp.country as country, tp.position as position, tp.china_price as china_price, tp.stock as stock, tp.car_price as car_price FROM t_products tp LEFT JOIN sys_config sys ON tp.brand_id = sys.id WHERE tp.`status` =2 AND tp.recommend = 0 AND sys.state = 0 ORDER BY tp.update_date DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.update: UPDATE t_products SET stock = stock-1, update_date =NOW() WHERE products_id = #{productsId} AND stock -1 >= 0
UPDATE t_products SET stock = stock+1, update_date =NOW() WHERE products_id = #{productsId}
mapper.select: SELECT products_id FROM t_products WHERE oper_id = #{operId}
